questions_and_answers.question: When do you prefer to study?
How long can you study in one sitting without losing focus?
How much advance preparation do you need for exams or quizzes?
Do you prefer to complete assignments:

What is your preferred wake-up time?

questions_and_answers.answer: A balance of both work and relaxation
